block_comment: This block of Verilog RTL code is a counter which gets incremented at the positive edge of the user interface clock signal. The counter will be reset to zero when "int_sys_rst" reset signal is active and it checks whether the most significant bit of the "wait_200us_counter" is one. The incrementation persists until the "wait_200us_counter" value reaches the maximum (when the MSB bit becomes "1"), after which the value of the counter stays at the maximum value without further incrementation.
